title: NYTS 2023 Social Media Exposure of Ecigarettes

crumbs: Stratified Tables Ecigarette Exposure in Social Media

text:
Introduction
This is a report on the analysis of the 2023 National Youth Tobacco Survey (NYTS) data. The NYTS is a cross-sectional, school-based survey that collects information on tobacco use among middle and high school students in the United States. The survey is conducted by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) to monitor tobacco use among youth and inform tobacco prevention and control efforts.
